content:
I may be in need of creating a extension for weekConstraint. I have a drug that will be taken for just one week.

Trastuzumab
4 mg/kg IV over 90 minutes on Day 1 of Week 1 followed by
2 mg/kg IV over 30 minutes on Day 1 beginning with Week 2

Dosage[1].rateQuantity = 4mg/kg
Dosage[1].timing.duration = 90
Dosage[1].timing.durationUnit = min
Dosage[1].timing.boundsDuration = 1 wk

Dosage[2].rateQuantity = 2mg/kg
Dosage[2].timing.duration = 30
Dosage[2].timing.durationUnit = min
Dosage[2].timing.boundsDuration = 1 wk
